settings.question: Probiotic Supplements for Women, Men & Kids
settings.answer_body1: As a reputable company with over 20 years of experience in the health and wellness industry, you can trust Well Well Well Nutrition Centre to supply you and your whole family with the best probiotic supplements online in Canada and worldwide.

settings.question: When is the best time to take probiotics?
settings.answer_body1: Most probiotic supplements are now enteric-coated capsules, allowing them to make it past the acid in our stomach to the large intestine/colon where they do the most work. Many of them you can take anytime, with or without food. The best time to take probiotics can also be dependent on the company's instructions.

settings.question: What is the difference between probiotic and prebiotic supplements?
settings.answer_body1: Probiotic supplements are “good” bacteria maintaining and improving healthy microflora in the body. Prebiotics are the foods (typically high-fiber foods) that act as food for the probiotics. All probiotics supplements for women, men and kids all have some prebiotics in each capsule. At Well Well Well we have a wide range of organic and natural probiotic supplements and pills.

settings.question: What type of conditions are probiotics an effective treatment for?
settings.answer_body1: Probiotic supplements can be effective for IBS (Irritable Bowel Syndrome) treatment and can also be used for many different types of issues ranging from, bloating, gas, and UTI’s (Urinary Tract Infections), even skin issues. In some cases probiotics are good for weight loss as it helps eliminate bad bacteria. However, they must be in conjunction with dietary changes and in some cases additional supplementation for effective treatment and results.

settings.question: Should I take a probiotic when prescribed an antibiotic?
settings.answer_body1: New studies indicate that taking probiotic supplements can benefit the immune system while taking antibiotics. But you can not take probiotics in replacement for antibiotics. The probiotics help restore gut flora for the gut microbiome. Just make sure to take probiotics and antibiotics 3 hrs away from each other. You can continue to use probiotics even after you finish antibiotics to replenish the gut with healthy microflora that the antibiotic killed.

settings.question: What are the benefits of taking probiotic supplements for women?
settings.answer_body1: There are many benefits for women taking a probiotic supplement as low as 10 billion can help maintain general gut health. Probiotics with stronger strengths can help restore a female's micro flora as well as help resolve gut issues. Probiotics are also good for skin health. Even for more problematic issues, like acne and eczema, probiotics can be helpful. At Well Well Well we are your trusted retailer to buy probiotic supplements online in Canada and worldwide.

settings.question: What are the benefits of taking probiotic supplements for men?
settings.answer_body1: The probiotic benefits for men are similar to women. It can improve gut health and it can help with skin issues. The introduction of probiotics in the gut for eczema can reduce your number of overall flare ups. Probiotics can help strengthen and restore microflora for men and be a beneficial supplement for prostate health, male fertility and testosterone. Finding the best probiotic supplement for men is dependent on each individual's needs and can differ from person to person.

settings.question: What Do Probiotics Do for Your Body?
settings.answer_body1: Probiotic supplements help to restore a healthy balance of good bacteria in your digestive system. Taking them on a regular basis can aid your digestion, reduce symptoms of various chronic conditions and aid weight management.

settings.question: Should Probiotics Be Taken Daily?
settings.answer_body1: The most recommended probiotic supplement products that we sell are designed to be taken daily but it is up to you how often you take them. For best effects, we suggest following the manufacturer’s instructions.

settings.question: What Are the Signs You Need Probiotics?
settings.answer_body1: If you frequently suffer from upset stomachs, constipation, diarrhea or bloating, it may be a sign that you should consider using digestive supplements. Buy the best probiotic supplement you can find and see what difference it makes to your symptoms.

settings.question: Should I Take Probiotics in the Morning or at Night?
settings.answer_body1: As long as you take your probiotic supplements directly before or during a meal, it doesn’t really matter what time of the day it is. The important thing is to make sure you have some food in your stomach when you take them, so the bacteria are not immediately killed by your stomach acid.
